scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf server/dist client/dist server/node_modules client/node_modules node_modules
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start the application.'
